titles.title: Political Appointees Budgetary Savings Act of 1995
To provide for Federal budgetary savings through reducing the number of political appointees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight. subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 5/18/1995--Introduced. Limits to 2,000 the number of federal political appointees.
